attributes.action: Fix the NHS by increasing pay for nurses and funding hospitals more.
attributes.additional_details: The country has been severely impacted by the cost of living crisis and the nurses going on strike. We also need to fund hospitals due to the fact that we have been impacted by the cost of living crisis
attributes.background: I would like the parliament to fix the NHS, improve standard of living, reduce costs and increase the pay for nurses and fund hospitals

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase pay for Nurses and Ambulance workers in line with union demands: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630106

Give doctors and nurses the 20% pay rise they deserve: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630032

Ensure All National Health Staff receive a minimum 7.5% pay increase: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630102

Fund increase number of NHS mental health inpatient beds: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620911
